name: @devanshdeveloper/is-this
description: A lightweight JavaScript utility for type checking.

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.watch: npm run watch:esm & npm run watch:cjs
scripts.publish: git add . && git commit -m /"code updated"/ && git push && npm publish --access public

author: Devansh Khetwani
